title: Butterfly Kyodai Rainbow
description: Play Butterfly Kyodai Rainbow – a relaxing and colorful butterfly-matching puzzle game with fresh mechanics and vibrant rainbow visuals! Enjoy hundreds of exciting levels, earn daily rewards, take part in special events, and unlock beautiful new wings. A fun Mahjong-style connect game for all ages – no download required!
instructions: Tap or click two matching butterfly wings to connect them and set them free. Make sure the path between them is clear — other tiles will block the way. Your goal is to clear the entire board as quickly as possible. Stuck? Use boosters to help you out!

title: Soccer Tournament
description: Soccer Tournament is a fun and fast-paced tabletop-style soccer game where you control a team of caps, flicking them to pass, shoot, and score goals. Strategize your moves, outplay your opponent, and aim for victory in this exciting, skill-based challenge!
instructions: Tap or click the cap (player) and drag to adjust the direction and shooting power. Release to shoot. Kick the ball into the opponent's goal to score points.

title: Royal Garden Match
description: Welcome to Royal Garden Match! You’ve inherited a grand Royal Castle and a once-beautiful garden—now it’s up to you to bring its beauty to life! Solve exciting match-3 puzzles by combining exquisite royal flowers, fruits, and plants to unlock powerful boosters. With hundreds of challenging levels, unique royal characters, and a magical journey ahead, there's always something new to discover. Can you make the royal garden flourish? Play now and start your enchanting adventure!
instructions: Match three or more identical icons in this exciting tile-matching game! Swap flowers, fruits, and plants by dragging them to switch places—each move must form a valid match. Keep an eye on the panel to see which items to collect and how many moves you have. Match 4 or 5 pieces to unleash powerful line bursts, cross bursts, and color boosters. Merge boosters for even bigger effects! Strategize your moves, create stunning combos, and complete levels with dazzling garden magic!

title: Football Rush 3D
description: Football Rush 3d is a fast-paced, one-touch soccer game that puts you in the boots of a solo football hero. Forget complex controls—just tap, strike, and score! Whether you’re curving shots from midfield or charging down the pitch with speed boosts, every moment is packed with action.
instructions: WASD or arrow buttons to move. Hold Left Mouse Button (LMB) to shoot. Press Right Mouse Button(RMB) to pass. Press LMB to tackle. Press C to change camera angle. Press I to disable UI.

title: Aventador Vice Crime City
description: Dive into city driving with four game modes. Navigate realistic traffic and monitor your fuel while exploring busy streets. Enjoy stunning morning city graphics, transforming the city into a spectacle. Pedestrians add unpredictability, and hitting them triggers police chases. Customize your car's appearance and performance. All this chaos is accompanied by your cute dog. Whether evading the cops or just cruising, Aventador Vice Crime City offers a thrilling and visually amazing experience.
instructions: W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys: Drive/Steer/Brake Left Shift: Nitro C: Change Camera G: Slow Motion

title: Kingdom match
description: Kingdom match is a competitive match-3 game with castle decoration options! Complete levels, compete with other players and build the best castle!
instructions: Collect objects of the same color in a row and complete tasks in the levels! Complete as many levels as possible to get ahead of other players!

title: Match Masters
description: Match Masters is a real-time multiplayer match-3 puzzle game where players compete head-to-head on the same board. Each move requires strategic thinking, as it can benefit both you and your opponent. Utilize unique boosters, participate in tournaments, and climb the global leaderboards in this dynamic and engaging game.
instructions: Match 3 or more tiles of the same color to score points. Matching blue stars charges your booster; red circles charge your opponent's. Activate your booster strategically to gain an advantage. Each player takes turns, making every move crucial.

title: Catch The Goose
description: Catch The Goose is a puzzle elimination mini-game. Players can tap identical items to automatically send them to the bottom slot - when three matching items gather, they get eliminated. When players successfully clear all items arranged in the grid, they get to "catch" a mischievous goose. Its addictive simplicity, stress-relieving design, and playful art style have made it a cultural phenomenon.
instructions: 1. Tap three identical items to eliminate them. 2. Complete all eliminations to capture the goose. 3. Use power-ups (e.g., Add Slot or Shuffle) for tricky levels.

title: Pet Tile Master
description: Enjoy a fun pet-themed tile-matching challenge in Pet Tile Master! Draw up to 9 tiles featuring adorable pets and match three identical ones to clear them. Be careful—if the stack fills up with 9 tiles, the game is over! Use smart moves to uncover hidden tiles and complete each level. Have fun with cute animals, relaxing gameplay, and tricky puzzles!
instructions: Tap or click to pick a tile and place it in the stack. Match three identical tiles to clear them—if the stack reaches 9 tiles, the game is over!

title: Diamond mosaic
description: Ready to create your own masterpiece from a scattering of diamonds on your screen? Come to our mosaic! Fill images with diamond scatter!
instructions: Instructions: 1. Choose a picture that you like 2. With a pen, apply diamonds to the canvas, matching them to the desired numbers. Get shiny, brilliant images. Controls: On PC: click with the left mouse button On mobile device: tap on the game elements on the touch screen.

title: Downhill Car Ride: Crash Test
description: Put on a real destructive show! Forget about safety, in this game you need to check how strong the dummy is. At your disposal is a huge pile of dummies, an abandoned town, an incredibly huge arsenal and complete freedom of action! In this game you can check what will happen if you crash a motorcycle at full speed into a house with dynamite or what will happen if you jump out of the car a second before the accident!
instructions: The entire location is filled with destructible objects, try to demolish as many buildings, trees, poles and other things as possible to earn more money. Controls: PC - to speed up, you need to quickly press the left mouse button on the playing area. To exit the car or jump, press the left mouse button on the corresponding icon. Mobile - to speed up, you need to quickly press your finger on the playing area. To exit the car or jump, press your finger on the corresponding icon.

title: Graduation Makeup Trends
description: Discover the latest makeup trends with our Graduation Makeup Trends game! From bold and fierce to soft and elegant, this game offers a variety of makeup options to suit your style. We bring 3 BFFs, each with a unique style, many makeup options, stunning dresses, and accessories for your inspiration. Mixed with floral printed dresses, golden jewelry, and holographic accessories, in the Graduation Makeup Trends game, you will find everything you need to help these girls make a statement.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Meme challenge.io
description: "Meme Challenge.io" is straight-up chaos. It’s you vs. the wildest, most unhinged character names ever like Spaghetti Tualetti and Bombardino Crocodilo. Tap fast, think faster, and don’t get caught slippin’. It’s giving brain-lag. Only real ones can vibe their way to the Wcup.
instructions: Choose the correct answer / Use provided controls

title: Stick Hero Fight
description: Enter the most nervous stickman battles. In Stick Hero Fight, you as a mighty stickman hero. Fight through waves of enemies using incredible battle skills. This action game lets you upgrade your hero and unleash devastating attacks to dominate every fight! Use punches, weapons, and powerful skills to deliver deadly attacks.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Serious Head
description: Prepare to defend yourself. Purchase defensive structures, recharge your energy and fight off waves of monsters. Kill bosses and upgrade weapons. Complete the final day and close the portals!
instructions: WASD = move Left mouse button = shoot Right mouse button = iron sight Mouse wheel or 1-6 = change weapons Space = jump

title: World War 2 Shooter
description: World War 2 Shooter is a new first person shooter where you can become a real soldier of World War 2 and fight against enemies! Defeat foes in dynamic battles and be a hero on the battlefield!
instructions: Keyboard: WASD G for grenade H for use first aid kit C for squat M1 for aim M2 for shooting SPACE for jump ESC for menu SCROLL WHEEL for change weapon.

title: Gemstone Glam
description: Welcome to the fabulous world filled with sparkling gems! Here you will meet two princess girlfriends who adore fashionable outfits and the glitter of colorful stones in fashionable outfits. Try on dresses inspired by the radiance of a diamond, the passion of a ruby, the freshness of an emerald and the mystery of an amethyst. Create shining combinations of hairstyles, dresses and accessories to transform young princesses into real fashion queens. Feel like a real stylist of the jewelry kingdom!
instructions: Help two girlfriends create a fabulous look with luxurious dresses decorated with precious stones, crystals and rhinestones. You can save the most interesting images at the end of the game as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, either a click of a computer mouse or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

title: Pentaword
description: Guess the hidden five-letter word in just six tries! Use logic, spelling, and word skills in this brain teaser. Can you crack the Pentaword?
instructions: Your goal is to guess the hidden 5-letter word in 6 tries or less. After each guess, the tiles will change color to show how close your guess was: Green – Correct letter in the correct spot Yellow – Correct letter in the wrong spot Gray – Letter not in the word Use your keyboard to type letters or click on the on-screen keyboard. Press Enter to submit a guess and Backspace to delete a letter.

title: Brawl Bros Squad
description: Introducing a new exciting third-person shooter — Brawl Bros Squad! Fight opponents in a variety of conditions. Discover a variety of unique skins to make yourself unique. Enjoy dynamic jumps, accurate shooting and get ready for intense battles. Become a real champion among players around the world and prove that you are the best in this crazy world!
instructions: W, A, S, D - walk Space - jump R - reload 1, 2 - change weapons F - weapon selection 3, 4 - grenades P - pause LMB - shoot, throw a grenade Automatic shooting on a mobile device RMB - aim on a sniper Tab - leaderboard

title: Celebrity Aesthetic Challenge
description: Celebrity Aesthetic Challenge lets you explore a range of unique celebrity-inspired styles! Compete in fun fashion challenges as you mix and match outfits, accessories, and hairstyles to recreate iconic looks. From E-girl and Soft-girl vibes to edgy streetwear and glam red carpet ensembles, showcase your creativity and win the ultimate fashion battle. Can you rise to the challenge and become the trendsetting fashion icon? Let the style showdown begin!
instructions: left mouse button click

title: Mr. Drifter: Car Chase Simulator
description: Run fast, crash hard, and cheat death — in style. Race through a chaotic low-poly city as you dodge police, traffic, and total destruction. Use game-changing power-ups like Slow-Mo, Freeze, and EMP Blasts to escape the impossible. Unlock wild getaway cars ⚡ Grab power-ups mid-chase Smash through obstacles & roadblocks Stylized low-poly world with top-down tilt Endless cops. Infinite chaos. One rule: don’t stop. How long can you stay free?
instructions: Desktop: Move with WASD or Arrow Keys Collect power-ups and dodge obstacles to stay alive Touch Devices: Use on-screen touch controls to steer

title: Italian Brainrot Quiz
description: Italian Brainrot Quiz is a chaotic meme-guessing game where you match bizarre names to iconic brainrot characters! From Tralalero Tralala to Bombardiro Crocodilo and Tung Tung Tung Sahur – can you guess them all? Each round is a wild ride through surreal Italian meme culture. Laugh, confuse your friends, and become the ultimate Brainrot Champion. Spaghetti logic guaranteed. Ready to play?
instructions: use mouse and play

title: Brainrot Merge Drop Puzzles
description: Drop and merge Italian Brainrot. Trallallero Trallala, Tum Tum Tum Saur, Boneca Ambalabu and more. Play funny memes. Drag and drop memes.
instructions: Drag and drop memes from the top of the screen. Two identical touch merge into a new one.

title: Cards: Klondike Solitaire
description: A classic card game known for its simple and fun mechanics. If you love solitaire games, then this game is just for you! A famous card puzzle game that is popular among players all over the world. Perfectly relaxing!
instructions: The goal of the game is to arrange all the cards into four piles in ascending order, starting with the Ace, so that cards of the same suit are in the same pile. The game ends when all cards are dealt.

title: Merge Fellas Online
description: Enjoy the Italian Brainrot meme world in this Merge game. Immerse yourself in the Italian Brainrot world and merge identical characters to accumulate points and reach the highest score. A simple and easy mechanic, drop characters together to form higher-value ones, providing rewards with each successful merge. Solve the puzzle and merge all the pets!
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Highscore meme game; Awesome HD Graphics; Use the mouse or touch to play

title: Mega Ramp Car Stunts
description: Get ready for the ultimate stunt-driving challenge in Mega Ramp Car Stunts! Take control of powerful cars and race down sky-high mega ramps to perform mind-blowing jumps, flips, and tricks. Defy gravity as you soar through the air and land like a pro on impossible tracks. With dynamic gameplay, extreme stunts, and intense visuals, this is the stunt arena where only the boldest drivers survive!
instructions: WASD or Arrow Keys

title: Clap Clap Nightmare
description: Clap Clap is a short indie horror game that puts you in the shoes of a house sitter, experiencing strange occurrences in a seemingly ordinary home.
instructions: Press K to Perform action. Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Strykon
description: Strykon is a mobile FPS game with exciting missions and battles. Play different modes like Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Free-for-All, where your goal is to survive. Choose from many weapons, like pistols, rifles, shotguns, and snipers. Each gun has its own style. Enjoy great graphics, realistic sound, and easy controls. Earn rewards with the Battle Pass to keep the game interesting. Whether you complete missions or fight enemies, this shooter is full of action anytime, anywhere!
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Starry Style Dorama of Dream
description: Welcome to an exciting journey into the world of Korean doramas heroes! Here you can become a stylist for two aspiring young film actors: a young actress whose heart beats to the rhythm of romantic stories, and a charismatic actor whose smile can melt even the coldest hearts. You will be able to choose from a variety of outfits, accessories and hairstyles, creating unique images that emphasize the individuality of your characters.
instructions: This game takes you into the world of Korean multi-part films-doramas, where you will take on the role of a stylist for a couple of aspiring actors. The most stylish images of your wards can be saved at the end of the game as PNG-images. Depending on the gaming device, either a click of a computer mouse or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

title: Delta Force Airborne
description: This game offers a whole new level of graphics and sound design that completely immerses you in a realistic atmosphere of battles. Shoot and use tactical thinking to overcome obstacles and achieve victory together with your team. Explore a variety of maps, each of which is full of unique opportunities and strategic points. Become a master of team play by coordinating with your teammates and using different character classes to create the perfect strategy.
instructions: Keyboard: WASD M2 - for aiming M1 - for shooting TAB - for counting P - for menu 1-2 numbers - for changing weapons. Mobile: Controls - buttons Automatic shooting when aiming or on the shoot button

title: Vortex io
description: Play Vortex.io for free! Swallow everything in your path and become the biggest vortex in this fast-paced io game. Vortex.io is a competitive .io game where you control a growing vortex that can swallow objects, vehicles, and even other players. As you absorb more items, your size increases, making you more powerful in the arena. The game features smooth controls and intense gameplay, requiring quick reflexes and smart movement to survive and dominate your rivals in real time.
instructions: Mouse Move / Arrow Keys / WASD – Control direction

title: Paint Roller
description: Control two tethered spheres in this unique painting challenge. Click to anchor one sphere in place while the other swings around it on an elastic tether, leaving a dynamic paint trail. Your objective? Strategically rotate your tethered pair to completely coat all target cylinders in each level.
instructions: One-click controls

title: Secret Galaxy. Match-three
description: "Secrets of the Galaxy" is an exciting match-3 game where you embark on a space journey with pilot Inessa and her faithful robot A.S.K.A. Their ship is damaged, and they are stranded in the depths of the universe. To return home, you must solve engaging puzzles by matching elements and creating powerful combos. Along the way, you will face asteroids, laser traps, space distortions, and other unique obstacles.
instructions: On each level, you'll face challenges like asteroids, laser traps, and space distortions. Use special bonuses, activate portals, and clear obstacles to advance. Plan your moves carefully, as some levels have time limits, while others require completing tasks in a set number of moves.

title: Choo Choo Spider Monster Train
description: Welcome to the most terrifying train ride of your life! Cho-Cho Scary Charles: Spider Train is a chilling open-world survival horror shooter where your only lifeline is a small yellow train armed with a machine gun and a whole lot of courage. Face off against Charles — the monstrous spider-train hybrid that haunts a remote island, preying on unsuspecting humans. No one knows where he came from, but one thing is clear — he won't stop until he's fed.
instructions: 1-Start Your Train Begin your journey in your yellow survival train. Use the map to navigate across the haunted island. 2. Upgrade Your Train Use them to upgrade: Speed – outrun monsters Arror – take damage 3. Fight or Flee When Charles attacks, use your mounted machine gun to shoot him. Jump off the train if needed to escape or explore.

title: Shoot And Drive
description: Radiation is spreading all over the world. People are going crazy, a tough battle for life continues. After falling into the trap of bandits along with your crewmates, you’ll have to fight to the end. And your best ‘friends’ — a rusty gun and a car that’s about to stall — will come to your aid.
instructions: WASD = move / drive a vehicle F - Enter/Exit Left-click = shoot Right-click = iron sight Mouse wheel / 1-6 = change weapons Left-shift = run C = crouch

title: Your dream room
description: Do you dream of creating the perfect room? In this game you will become a real interior designer! Have fun, experiment and turn an empty space into a cozy dream corner. Choose wallpaper, flooring and furniture in different styles. Decorate the room with stylish accessories, add coziness! Choose the color scheme and arrange items as you like. Experiment with design, create unique interiors and enjoy the process! Start creating your dream room now!
instructions: 1. Choose what you want to change Click the tassel button to start decorating! 2. browse the options Use the arrows to choose wallpaper, flooring, furniture or decorations. 3.When you find something you like, click the checkmark to save your changes. 4. Continue decorating Repeat these steps for all elements of the room until you've created the perfect space! 5.Finalize the design Done? Press the key button. 6.Want to try a different style? Click on the round arrow button to start over!

title: Flower Collection
description: Flower Collection is a poetic casual adventure game where players explore a beautiful natural world to collect various rare and beautiful flowers. The game combines exploration, collection, and light puzzle elements to bring players a peaceful and delightful gaming experience.
instructions: - Players take on the role of a botanist exploring the vast natural world - Find the growing locations of rare flowers by observing environmental clues - Use the correct tools and methods when collecting flowers to avoid damaging plants - Complete the flower encyclopedia to learn the stories and knowledge behind each flower

title: Escape From Tung Tung Sahur
description: Escape From Tung Tung Sahur is a fast-paced runner-platformer where quick reflexes are your only chance of survival! You play as a lone runner escaping the bizarre and relentless anomaly known as Tung Tung Sahur. Sprint across platforms, leap over deadly gaps, and avoid sudden obstacles. With intuitive one-touch controls, the game is easy to play but challenging to master. Each level introduces new platform layouts and jump timing that push your skills to the limit.
instructions: On Desktop: Press Arrow Up or Spacebar to jump. On Mobile: Tap to jump.

title: CraftMart
description: Play CraftMart online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Merge Brainrot
description: Drop and merge the most cursed Italian Brainrot memes! From "Trallallero Trallala" to "Tum Tum Tum Saur! and "Boneca Ambalabu", they’re all here. What final Brainrot will you unlock? Dare to find out!
instructions: - Drag and drop Brainrot memes from the top of the screen. - When two identical memes touch, they merge into a new one!

title: Brilliant Jewels
description: Brilliant Jewels is a Match 3 game where you can either play against the time or try to pass levels with limited amount of moves. If you are feeling confident, you can also challenge the hard mode on the time attack mode. This game doesn't lack any sparkle!
instructions: Match three or more similar jewels to clear them from the board. Match four or more to receive special tiles. Combine two special tiles to create something even more special.

title: Bubble Shooter Legend
description: Enjoy a fun shooting puzzle game in Bubble Shooter Legend. Use your shooting skills in this casual puzzle game. Your goal is to match bubbles of the same color. Make them explode and disappear to complete each level step by step. Match three or more bubbles of the same color by aiming and firing them to explode and eliminate them!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: FRAGEN
description: FRAGEN offers intense gunfights and challenges! With dynamic game modes, you can test your skills in different ways and become the best shooter out there! Are you ready to join the fight? Gear up, and prove your skills!
instructions: Keyboard: WASD G for grenade-gun C for squat R for reload 1 - primary weapon 2 - secondary weapon M1 for aim M2 for shooting SPACE for jump ESC or TAB for menu SCROLL WHEEL for change weapon SHIFT + W - run SHIFT + W + C - slide

title: Italian Brainrot Tung Tung Racing
description: Italian Brainrot Tung Tung Racing is a hyper-chaotic, turbo-charged racing game where logic goes to die and only the wildest survive. In a world where speed meets absurdity, you’ll choose from a trio of outrageous racers, strap into your customized Formula car, and blast through tracks so insane they might just melt your brain. This isn’t your average kart racer—this is pure, high-octane brainrot.
instructions: Arrow keys to move

title: Spider Solitaire
description: Challenge yourself with this captivating solitaire inspired by the classic Spider card game! Arrange all the cards on the table into complete sequences of the same suit (from King to Ace), testing your logic, strategy, and patience. Choose your difficulty level, play with one, two, or all four suits, and prove your skills with the deck. Every move counts—can you complete all the sequences before running out of options?
instructions: The goal is to complete descending sequences of the same suit, from King to Ace. You can move cards or stacks in descending order, even if they are of different suits. Once a complete sequence of the same suit is formed, it will be removed from the table. If no moves are available, deal new cards by tapping the deck at the top. Choose your difficulty: - Easy: 1 suit - Medium: 2 suits - Hard: 4 suits Complete all sequences to win the game!

title: Zen Master - 3 tiles
description: You can test your skills in this addictive puzzle game without time or place constraints. If you like solving problems like Match 3, Sudoku or Mahjong, then you will definitely like this game. Collect three identical tiles to clear the board. Your goal is to completely clear the board of a variety of picture tiles. The levels start out easy and relaxing, but gradually become more challenging and addictive!
instructions: Select three identical tiles to remove them from the board. You can only select tiles that are free and not covered from above. Only 8 tiles can fit in the bottom bar. If it fills up, you lose. Your goal is to gradually remove all the tiles from the board. Use boosters to speed up the game. Play Zen Master on different devices: computer, mobile phone, tablet. We wish you good luck!

title: Plane Chase
description: Ever watched a plane soar across the blue sky and thought, 'Hey, I could catch that… in my car!'? Well, your oddly specific and gravity-defying dreams are about to come true in 'Plane Chase'! Fasten your seatbelts, rev the engine, and remember: it's not car theft if you're aiming for the plane! Are you ready for takeoff in the wackiest chase ever? Download 'Plane Chase' and steer your way through this high-flying, tire-screeching adventure. The skies are literally not the limit!
instructions: Use your mouse to steer. Avoid obstacles and get into the plane!

title: Doge's Battle Royale
description: Want to join the most hilarious and action-packed survival shooting game ever? In Doge's Battle Royale, you take control of the legendary Doge. Battle on a battlefield full of guns, weapons, and crazy opponents. Defeat enemies and pick up their items. Strategize your moves, and shoot with precision to outlast your enemies in this intense Battle Royale challenge.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Capybara Suika
description: Capybara Suika is a fun and relaxing food merge puzzle game starring adorable capybaras! Inspired by the viral Suika Game, drop and merge food to grow bigger and score higher. With colorful visuals, cozy vibes, and a tiny game size, it’s the perfect lite game to enjoy anytime!
instructions: Use mouse or touch to interact with in game elements.

title: Two Archers: Bow Duel
description: Get ready for a great battle at the Archery Tournament, because no one is going to just give up and let you win. With each new battle, your enemies will only become stronger. But you shouldn't stay put either. Buy new equipment. A huge selection of different bows will help you defeat your enemies, from simple wooden ones to magical golden bows with incendiary arrows! Earn money by participating in the tournament.
instructions: Controls: PC - the sight direction changes automatically, to pull the bowstring, hold down the left mouse button, to shoot, release the left mouse button. Mobile - the sight direction changes automatically, to pull the bowstring, hold your finger on the screen, to shoot, release your finger.
